originalTitle: Islamic police in Nigeria arrest nine Muslims for not fasting during Ramadan
title: Islamic police in Nigeria arrest nine Muslims for not fasting during Ramadan
content: Officers in Kano search cafes and restaurants every year during Ramadan looking for Muslims breaking the fast.

title: Arsenal squander two-goal lead as Wolves score late to earn draw
content: A Ricardo Calafiori own goal in the 94th minute gives Wolves a point. as the Premier League's bottom side come back from two goals down against leaders Arsenal at Molineux.
